product_name: 313 Anker Wireless Charger (Pad), Qi-Certified 10W Max for iPhone 14/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 Pro Max, AirPods (No AC Adapter, Not Compatible with MagSafe Magnetic Charging)

reviews.review: Received exactly what I ordered. Good quality, and fast shipping. Would deal with seller again.

Works perfectly with iPhone 11
Great for the bedside table because it only has one LED light and its very tiny, so it doesnt make the room glow like some chargers.
Phone doesn't seem to get overly hot.
Quite slow to charge my iPhone but gets there eventually. Seems good with the kindle though.
Good item at a faire price
Works perfectly, arrived in a couple of days. Very happy
Works well very slow to charge
Just what I needed
Kind of over heats upon charging for both phone and also bluetooth buds

Unlike the official Samsung wireless pad, this wireless charging pad does not contain a fan. However, despite the lack of fan, I have not run into any particular heat issues when it comes to wireless charging. Although the device and pad get slightly warm when in use, neither of them have been concerningly warm to date.

The rubber surface is nice for keeping the phone aligned to the charger's coil, and the charger itself on the table, although the uniformity of both rubber surfaces makes it slightly difficult to tell which way is up, and I nearly set it on the table upside-down after cleaning. The rubber surfaces also have a habit of sticking to dust very easily. I found the charger to be very dusty within a day or so of using it on a mostly clean room. Fortunately, the dust seems to be fairly easily remedied by a quick wipe-down with a damp cloth, although I do not know if this is a recommended method of cleaning the charger.

An issue that I have with the charger is that the LED is difficult to see, and is often covered by a phone if it is being used, thereby defeating the point of the LED in the first place. This makes it difficult to tell whether a phone is charging, misaligned, or if there are any issues with the wireless charger, without rotating or removing the phone, the former of which is not suitable if the charger is in a more awkward location, and the latter causes the charger to shut off within moments, making removing the phone to see the LED useless.

The wireless charger also does not seem to have any issues when it comes to thicker cases. I use an Otterbox Defender case on my phone, and I have not experienced any issues with charging the phone through the case.
Bought for my granddaughters and they report that it is very useful. Performs well and used often.

Initial impressions were fine, althought it didn't do fast charging. I've since bought an official Samsung fast charger with USB connection which has enabled "fast wireless charging". Fast wireless charging is a middle ground between slow charging and fast charging directly from the charger.

Reviews saying fast charging doesn't work are just wrong. Get the right charger for it and it works fine. Gets a little bit hot but nothing major.
I use this to charge next to my bed. It is easier then finding the charging cable and attempting to plug it in at night before bed.

Thoroughly enjoy using the wireless charger however the disadvantage is the charger isnt strong enough to operate properly when my iPhone 12 is in its wallet case so its a small matter of removing the phone to charge.
Having said that its brilliant because Ive a new routine of charging whilst sleeping.

A fabulous option for tradies!! I bought this for my husband who has spent more than 2 years replacing chargers and blowing dirt and dust out of his phone before successfully connecting the charger. Now he simply places his phone on top of this charger without a worry. He loves it!

Good product but after several months it started getting testy, I had to unplug and plug back in to get it working, and then it just stopped working altogether.

Update: they were very nice to contact me and send me a new one without having to go through the trouble of sending the old one back. Hopefully this one lasts longer because I've tried other ones and didn't like them as much as this one, especially for charging my earbuds.

I haven't actually used this yet because had to order the very specific charger USB plug thing in order for it to charge properly. It does say it in the description of this item that it doesn't come with the plug but I assumed, since I have a million laying around, that one of the plugs I have would be sufficient. I did not. BUT! I am still really excited to use this as it does seem like a great product.

Does the job as an item like this should, but you have about 1cm range of movement between not charging, and charging. So absolutely make sure it is lined up before going to bed or you will wake up with a flat phone. Surely there is better on the market....but for the price?

No complaints here. I was aware that this would not fast-charge my phone due to compatibility (that is my phone's fault, not the charger). I also knew that I'd have to use an existing transformer (fine). Have had no issues with placement or heating or not charging etc. This seems to work better than wireless charger in my car or an older one I had already.
Price is a little high compared to other brands.
Works well with a charger that has both USB-C and USB-A output as that way you can use cable when you need the faster charge.

Bought this charger as my original charging cable kept coming off the port on my phone. With this one, I dont need to worry about dust clogging the charging port, faulty cable etc. The same adapter that came with my Samsung phone seems to be compatible with this charger. I haven't tracked the time it takes for a full charge that much, but it does seem to charge it within a reasonable time. Overall, quite happy with the purchase.
Didnt support all of my power bricks, nor my powerbank. Not even my 45 watt fast charging brick.

I like this charger as its a combo wireless charger doing obth small W devices (earbuds, smart watches, etc) as well as high W fast charging devices (samsung S23 ultra) without breaking a sweat. Typical Anker quality which is top notch. Do recommend

Bought 3 of these August last year when it was on sale, didnt use it until Dec. Has not used it since May. Which means it broke in less than 6 months of use.
The other one still seems fine; another unopened.
Tells you exactly what you need to know to use the charger. Best with a smart charge charger. Just a small premium treat to yourself that'll add so much more convenience to your device charging game.
this made charging my phone at night so much easier. All I had to do was lay it on the charger and roll over and go to sleep. No fiddling with wires or anything
Not a lot to say really. Small, light, does the job charging my S22. Wouldn't be without it. Which is why I bought another one for the guest room :)
Very happy with the charger, super quick delivery, very happy
It charges quite slowly so I've kept it as a spare and bought another faster cabled one.
Arrived promptly. Sits next to my bed and I just chuck it on there overnight. Better than fumbling around in the dark with cables and **** fingers. Paired with the Anker Quick Charge 3.0 18W charger.

Great little charging pad.

My only complaint is that sometimes if it is not in the correct position it will stop charging. This is not an issue if you check on it regularly (i.e. you have this charging pad on your desk while you work) but might be an issue if you leave it overnight and wakeup to your phone not being charged.

Ive left my phone charging for an hour which would usually significantly improve the battery but not with this one. Battery never seems to improve after charging it, regardless how long left on the pad, with the charging symbol on. Really disappointed, Id great hopes for the convenience
The charger worked perfectly and I bought a second for my office a week later.
The product is missing some important parts and also it doesnt have everything you need to use.

THANK YOU
GREAT PRODUCT

As a simple, bedside wireless charger for my iPhone 8 even when in a leather case, this is an excellent product with a sufficiently faint charging light not to cause noticeable reflections in the bedroom.
good value for this price product
I bought one and it failed after 14 months. I thought it was just a dud because it works so well, but now the second has failed again in 15 months. I expect the device to last much longer.
Bought it - worked okay for about 6 weeks. Then stopped working
Does exactly what I want, but not happy that in 2021 we're still seeing products with USB A to Micro USB. Should be all USB C.
Easy to use.
Just place your phone on it and it charges, even through the phone cover. Works on ipads too.
Seems to charge well. How ever has to be perfectly placed to work
Works as intended. Very happy with my purchase.
I received this for Christmas and love it. My old one was wearing out and not holding its charges.
I do not know too much about the tech side but it works flawlessly. And my phone got charged fully in reasonable amount of time.
The charger is too slow

You can never go wrong with the best power accessory company anker! The quality and surprisingly lightweight wireless charger is amazing! This is my second time I bought a wireless charger (samsung made ones are not good) and anker really blown me away.

My phone does not overheat and charges really fast while using it. What more can you ask for?
Use it only for my earbuds, I feel cool using them. hasn't crapped out on me or inexplicably broken down on me yet.

I liked it fast charge for the price I paid!
Plug it in to fast charge outlet and its done!
Love it.
Work as planned, but doesn't get the fast charge for my xiaomi mi 10 phone sadly. But it's okay
Not compatible with Airpods Pro
I have a ruggedised case on my iPhone XS. This charger works well to charge the iPhone, where the Apple MagSafe would connect but not charge the battery. This one works and saves your $$.
Works fine with the Kindle, won't touch the iphone unless taken out of the case, which is too much trouble

i have to put my phone few times until it starts charging. I don't have cover on phone so that is not the issue.

Apart from charging issue, it is nice. Once it starts charging, it works fine. Phone charges fine

Literally just started working once plugging in. Even works well through Otterbox thick cover as they mentioned. Just adjust expectations as any wireless charging will take longer than when a cable is used.

I haven't actually used it yet but the delivery was super fast...I bought it with a Kindle and the price was good.
It certainly looks easy to use.

It's micro usb, seriously.

It's cheap and crappy, has intermittent faults, sensitive to the phone being absolute dead centre.

I cant believe amazon recommended it.
Product was a gift

I purchased this wireless charger to replace an original Samsung one which stopped. This charger is simply brilliant, very fast & works much better than expected. I highly recommend this charger, you won't be disappointed.
This wireless charger is cheap and works well with my Samsung Galaxy S10, though the charge is as expected, slow.
Works well, doesn't take up much space, charges quickly (not as fast as Samsung plug in charger but easier) works well with new Kindle Paperwhite Signature. Recommended.
Recharging my new kindle
Great quality. Fast charging. Highly recommended.

I received this for a gift with my kindle a week ago and it doesnt even charge the kindle, only my mobile. I also thought that once charged it would work unplugged to the wall but no. I cant see any benefits for this product. I even paid $20 for a 9v plug  total waste on money. And my phone wasnt even charged quick

Great charger! Super fast and charges through the protective case I have on my phone. No more fumbling with cords.
Fast delivery too.
Always performs well across their brand
Delivered without a power adaptor, when advertised , you are not told you need a special power adaptor, the product is useless and the advertising deceptive.
It works really well and looks good. Very happy with my purchase as I was considering a cheaper option
It works as expected

i should have looked closer into this product. Waste of miney because i do not have a product to use it with. i believe false advertising. Thought it would be usable with priduct i puchased. How wrong i was next time i will not purchase adfitional products as are not applicable with my goods.
Love it, easy to charge. Fast delivery ordered in the morning and received in the evening. Just amazing!
Not bad for price
This is the only way my iPhone will now charge.
Doesn't come with a USB-C port.
Good value for money. Charges my phone quickly.
Works well, delivery next day pleasantly surprised
Charges fast and is very reliable. Have a number of them and all have been great.
After use an year suddenly can not use
Works as described - no comments
Very nice product at a cheap price

I am unable to comment as I have to wait until January next year before I actually receive my device which I have paid for at the same time as the charger and cover. I hope I will then be able to check if they operate adequately!
Its easy to use. Suits its purpose.
Works great. Bought another. Need you own power brick.
Like its ease of use
Waste of money. Stopped working after a month and is now outside of returns window so its going in the bin.
Fast shipping, easy to use
Awesome amazing thanks
Received this as a Xmas gift with my new kindle and less than 5 months later it barely charges. Changed the cord and still nothing. Not worth it

Didnt end up working. Always flashing blue and when I looked it up for help it said to get their specific plug which was another 40 dollars. And they also didnt have it working in Australia and so the wireless charger ended up being useless.
So far it hasn't let me down. Quick charge for my.phone while at work
Easy to use, quick charging

Was great till it stopped working after 24 hours
Maybe I got a dud
This requires a lot of patience to place your iPhone in the correct charging position. The LED indicator light is difficult to see
Delivered without a power adaptor. You are not told you need a special power adaptor. The advertising is deceptive.
It's not a fast charger. It does not charge very well.

A HIGH QUALITY wireless charger for your phone and other wireless phone accessories. If you want to take full advantage of Quick charge, you will need a Quickcharge 2.0 or greater adapter. NOTE: The charging pad itself can pick up a lot of dust if you live in a dusty environment, so be sure to clean it regularly to maintain proper operation.
Charging quality
